column4: I've just installed 4gigs of ram but 'free -m' only shows 3292,  Is there something else that needs to be configured to use the rest of my RAM?
are you running 32 bit, only x86_64 will see 4gb iirc
yeah 32bit but i was under the impression you could load a 32bit with more then 4gigs if you use a different kernel?
32 bit has a limit, that subject is beyond me. google has a ton of info though.
